p:
1.0 ml of a 1.87 mM 1,10‐phenanthroline solution and 2.0 ml of the sample were added to a screw‐capped tube and mixed. Then, 1.0 ml of a FeSO 4·7H 2O solution (1.87 mM) was added to the mixture. The reaction was initiated by adding 1.0 ml of H 2O 2 (0.03%, v/v). After incubating at 37°C for 60 min in a water bath, the absorbance of the reaction mixture was measured at 536 nm against a reagent blank. The reaction mixture without any antioxidant was used as the negative control, and a mixture without H 2O 2 was used as the blank. The hydroxyl radical scavenging activity (HRSA) was calculated using the following formula:
